EmailTemplate.description: ODE Notification on initial submission of complaint report
EmailTemplate.name: ODE Notice on initial submission of complaint
EmailTemplate.subject: Complaint received for {!Case.CLQ_Program_Name_Formula__c}, {!Case.CLQ_Intake_Date__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
A complaint was received for {!Case.CLQ_Program_Name_Formula__c}, {!Case.CLQ_Program_Number_Formula__c} on {!Case.CLQ_Intake_Date__c}. Please see the attached document or log in at (insert OCLQS Licensing link here) to view the complaint details.
ATTACHED DOCUMENTS: PDF copy of the complaint.
